function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Plasma therapy against covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic or endemic created by human activities","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exploitation of national crises to push through unpopular and extreme measures on the environment and labour rights","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on healthcare system","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of emergency services during strict lockdown","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forbidding contact between people from different households","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High morbidity rate for elderly and patients with co-morbidities due to compromised natural immunity.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific medicine or vaccine to control covid-19.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on social lockdown as the only preventive measure for covid-19 control.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment for covid-19","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of government support for the construction sector during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the post-covid-19 industry condition","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of business continuity measures for epidemic impacts","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of literature on the effects of covid-19 on construction firms","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contraction of the german economy due to covid-19 impacts on the building industry and construction operations.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions and slowdown of supplies and labor availability in the building industry due to covid-19.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluctuation of building operations in states and cities based on essential sector classification and covid-19 impacts.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in credibility of personal opinions over scientific data","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overconfidence and misinformation among physicians","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public trust in medical professionals","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation regarding the use of anti-inflammatory drugs in relation to covid-19 treatment","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence-based research on the recommended use of anti-inflammatory drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on expert opinions without sufficient scientific evidence","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evaluation of impacts of interventions","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize health in economic, political, food, and built environment sectors","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential compromise of data privacy and individual rights due to extensive tracing using big data and deployment of the police to enforce movement restriction measures.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable governance approaches leading to restricted access to safe spaces for physical activity and urban resources for certain communities.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential discrimination and harm resulting from the application of lockdown measures in a discriminatory manner.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralized fresh food markets leading to movement restrictions and closure impacts","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in multisectoral responses to pandemics","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to nutritious foods for vulnerable populations","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk-containment strategies at the community level","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines on safe physical activity outdoors during a pandemic","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of routine physical activity due to stay-at-home orders and curfew measures","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threatened food supply and increased food insecurity due to covid-19-related closures of national borders","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of climate change on vbds","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban and suburban planning and vbd risk","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantive discrimination in layoffs","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry-specific variation in layoff probabilities","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of school closures on the school-to-work transition for the children of immigrants","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrant participation gap in training and skills development","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher training needs for immigrants in occupations at risk of automation","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of pandemic on learning outcomes of children of immigrants","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe problems for newly arrived migrant and refugee children","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scant evidence on long-term effects such as school disengagement for children of immigrants","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overrepresentation of students from socio-economically disadvantaged backgrounds","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Language barriers and difficulties of foreign-born parents in guiding children through host-country curricula","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on educational attainment of children of immigrants during the crisis","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increases in neet rates among youth, especially immigrant youth","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionately negative impact of pandemic on educational outcomes of children of immigrants","category":"Community","confidence":"High"}]}
